snippet: Readers, including Kathleen McCartney of Smith College, respond to a Sunday Review essay, “The Media Has a Woman Problem.”
abstract: Letter from Kathleen McCartney, Smith College president, comments on Liza Mundy April 27 Op-Ed article on gender disparity in news media.
lead_paragraph: Readers, including Kathleen McCartney of Smith College, respond to a Sunday Review essay, “The Media Has a Woman Problem.”

headline.main: For Top Jobs, Qualified Women Are Everywhere
headline.print_headline: For Top Jobs, Qualified Women Are Everywhere
